author: USA TODAY, Joel Shannon, USA TODAY
title: 2 cats test positive for coronavirus; officials recommend precautions for pets
description: Officials say there is no evidence pets are spreading the disease to people. However, pet owners should take some common-sense precautions.
content:
People in face masks are a familiar sight amid the coronavirus outbreak, but now some are making sure their pets are covered as well.
USA TODAY
